definition: (Tw) (neologism c. 2007) information presented in easily assimilable form (digest, summary, infographic etc)

sentences.english: More responsive page rendering using lazy frame construction.
sentences.chinese: 更多的反应型页面渲染使用懒人框架结构。

sentences.english: China will hence be a nation of lazybones !
sentences.chinese: 然而中国从此成为一个懒人国了。

sentences.english: But lo, China will hence be a nation of lazybones.
sentences.chinese: 然而中国从此就成了一个懒人国了。

sentences.english: Jamal Malik: The guide book was written by a bunch of lazy good-for-nothing Indian beggars.
sentences.chinese: 那本指南是一群混饭吃的懒人写的。

sentences.english: I have trouble sleeping nights without a job. Am I a lazy man?
sentences.chinese: 因为没活干，我彻夜难眠，难道我是个懒人吗？

sentences.english: The X Lounger is based on a single ray, traced along a periodic double curved surface.
sentences.chinese: X懒人沙发是基于单线条，沿着曲面双层折叠而成的。

sentences.english: Her father will never approve of her marrying such a lazy fellow.
sentences.chinese: 她父亲永远不会赞成她嫁给这样的懒人。

sentences.english: I don't like lazy people or people who gossip.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢和懒人或是爱说长道短的人工作。

sentences.english: The lazy-bones lives in the lonely zone alone.
sentences.chinese: 懒人孤独地生活在偏僻地区。

sentences.english: Probably nothing, vegging out on his bed as usual.
sentences.chinese: 也许没做什么事，通常都会在他的床上当懒人。

sentences.english: As the door turneth upon its hinges, so doth the slothful upon his bed.
sentences.chinese: 懒人在床榻上辗转，犹如门扇在枢纽上旋转。

sentences.english: A result of "lazy reading" of words read silently.
sentences.chinese: 这是对懒人式的默读的测试结果。

sentences.english: Sloth Roth, ” Kris would call me.

definition: to loaf about/lazy/to hang around (and cause trouble to everyone)
(Internet slang) to recommend a product to sb
magical object/object symbolic of imperial power/fine weapon
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
